proto.description: Match incoming traffic using the given protocol

src_ip.description: Match incoming traffic from the specified source ip address

src_port.description: Match incoming traffic from the specified source port or port range

dest_ip.description: Match incoming traffic directed to the specified destination ip address

dest_port.description: Match incoming traffic directed at the given destination port or port range

mark.description: If specified, match traffic against the given firewall mark

set_mark.description: Zeroes out the bits given by mask and ORs value into the packet mark

set_xmark.description: Zeroes out the bits given by mask and XORs value into the packet mark
